BlueOnion democratizes access to ESG and sustainability data, empowering small and mid-sized asset managers and banks with affordable and accessible sustainability insights. Our intuitive platform analyzes performance against globally recognized frameworks and provides clear visualizations through the unique BlueOnion Taxonomy. By connecting asset buyers and sellers across public, private, and impact investing, we drive responsible investment decisions.

BlueOnion 讓 ESG 和可持續發展的數據取得更加民主化，為中小型資產管理公司和銀行提供合理價錢且易於取得的永續發展洞察力。我們直覺的平台會根據全球公認的框架分析績效，並透過獨特的 BlueOnion 分類法提供清晰可視化。透過將公共、私人和影響力投資領域的資產買家和賣家聯繫起來，我們推動負責任的投資決策。

column33: Manufacturing Technology,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology
column47:
Bolt began its journey as a leading battery manufacturer in Asia, leveraging army grade proprietary technology to create innovative energy solutions. Our humble beginning includes supplying batteries for fighter jets and submarines in China and standby power solutions for national telecom companies in the PRC. Over the years, Bolt has evolved into a global pioneer in battery energy storage systems (BESS), delivering comprehensive solutions for renewable energy projects worldwide. With clients such as Swisscom (Switzerland), Aramco (Saudi Arabia), Brititsh Telecom (UK) and as a qualified supplier for the World Bank, Bolt is trusted to provide top-tier products and services that meet the highest international standards.

At the heart of Bolt’s success is a dedicated engineering team, offering customized solutions to clients seeking efficient and reliable energy storage systems. We work closely with our partners to design, develop, and implement systems tailored to their specific project needs, ensuring optimal performance and longevity.

Our commitment goes beyond just technology. Bolt is deeply dedicated to promoting a resilient, sustainable, and self-sufficient energy solutions for all. We believe that our innovations in energy storage will help empower communities and industries to embrace renewable energy sources, reduce reliance on fossil fuels, and minimize environmental impact. Our current projects include a rural electrification project in Peru, a 100 MW+ solar energy storage project in the State of Nevada, a 20,000+ solar street light project in Thailand, a wind power energy storage system project in Germany among others.

With a shared vision of creating a cleaner, greener world, Bolt invites partners, stakeholders, and communities to join us in building a sustainable energy future for generations to come. Together, we can make a meaningful difference.


Bolt始于成为亚洲领先的电池制造商，利用军用级专有技术创造创新的能源方案。我们最初只为中国的战斗机和潜艇供应电池，以及为中国的国家电信公司提供备用电源方案。多年来，Bolt已发展成为全球电池储能系统（BESS）的先锋，为全球的可再生能源项目提供全面方案。我们的客户包括瑞士电信 (瑞士)、Aramco (沙特阿拉伯)、英国电信 (英国)，并作为世界银行的合格供应商，Bolt被信任以提供符合最高国际标准的顶级产品和服务。

Bolt成功的核心是一支敬业的工程团队，他们为寻求高效可靠的储能系统的客户提供定制方案。我们与合作伙伴紧密合作，设计、开发和实施量身定制的系统，以确保最佳性能和耐用性。

我们的承诺超越技术。Bolt致力于促进韧性、可持续和自给自足的能源方案。我们相信，我们在能源存储方面的创新将帮助社区和行业采纳可再生能源，减少对化石燃料的依赖，并最大限度地减少对环境的影响。我们当前的项目包括在秘鲁的农村电气化项目、内华达州100 MW以上的太阳能储能项目、泰国的20,000多个太阳能路灯项目以及德国的风能储能系统项目等。

秉承创建一个更清洁、更绿色世界的愿景，Bolt会邀请合作伙伴、利益相关者和社区与我们共同建设可持续的能源未来，造福子孙后代。我们相信，携手合作，我们可以带来有意义的改变。

Brdgx is an Asian treasury network providing seamless cross-border and domestic payment access across Asia. With regulatory approvals from multiple jurisdictions, At Brdgx, ww offer fast, secure, and cost-effective payment solutions tailored to meet the needs of businesses and individuals alike. Our robust infrastructure allows us to process large volumes of transactions, ensuring our clients benefit from competitive rates, rapid processing times, and enhanced transparency. Brdgx is a licensed MPI in Singapore, MSB in Malaysia, and MSO in Hong Kong.

Bridgewise is a global leader in investment intelligence, with a mission to bridge the gaps in the capital markets by making investment opportunities accessible to everyone, everywhere. We’re transforming how investors access and interact with financial information through innovative AI-powered solutions, including equity and fund analysis, multilingual insights, and actionable investment tools.
Bridgewise covers over 90% of global equities and funds, empowering investment decisions in 15 languages, and supporting over 50 institutional clients serving more than 25 million users.
Bridgewise is headquartered in Singapore and London with offices worldwide, partners with top financial organizations, including Nasdaq, JPX Rakuten and more.


Bridgewise 是全球投资智慧领域的领导者，致力于缩小资本市场的差距，让每个人随时随地轻松掌握投资机会。我们通过创新的 AI 技术，提供股票与基金分析、多语言洞察，以及实用的投资工具，彻底改变投资者获取与互动财务信息的方式。
Bridgewise 覆盖超过 90% 的全球股票与基金，支持 15 种语言，帮助 50 多家机构客户和超过 2500 万用户做出明智决策。
总部位于新加坡和伦敦的 Bridgewise 在全球各地设有办公室，并与包括 Nasdaq、JPX、乐天等顶尖金融机构合作，共创投资新时代。

column7: Science and Technology Park, China (Hong Kong)
column47:
BWSea is an innovative technology venture aiming to make aquaculture simple and sustainable, for resolving the pressing issues of food security, productivity, biosecurity and food safety. BWSea’s AIoT Precision Aquaculture Management Solution core technologies center around (1) place: intelligent offshore aquaculture deployment system, (2) prevention: intelligent aquaculture diseases prediction system and fish health management platform, and (3) monitoring: intelligent biomass detection system. BWSea is certified as national science and technology SME in China, and has been granted 4 patents and a national standard. BWSea is incorporated in Shanghai, Shenzhen and Hong Kong, and our Hong Kong R&D arm is admitted to the HKSTP incubation program.


BWSea 是一家创新科技企业，旨在简化和可持续发展水产养殖，以解决食品安全、生产力和生物安全等紧迫问题。BWSea 的 AIoT 精准水产养殖管理方案的核心技术围绕以下三个方面展开：(1) 位置：智能离岸水产养殖部署系统 (2) 预防：智能水产养殖疾病预测系统和鱼类健康管理平台，以及 (3) 监测：智能生物量检测系统。BWSea 被认证为中国国家科技中小企业，并获得了4项专利和1个国家标准。BWSea 在上海、深圳和香港注册成立，而我们的香港研发部门已被纳入香港科技园的创科培育计划。

Canopy offers extensive wealth management solutions tailored for Family Offices, Wealth Managers, Private Banks, Trustees, External Asset Managers worldwide, with US$180BN+ of Assets Under Reporting.


Canopy 总部位于新加坡，是一个云端的财富数据汇总和分析平台。Canopy 为全球的家族办公室、财富管理公司、私人银行、受托人、外部资产管理公司提供广泛的量身定制的财富管理方案，报告资产规模超过 1800 亿美元。

Canpanion aims to be APAC largest child development and Special Education Needs (SEN) platform, promoting tailored learning and neurodiversity. Our professional and evidence-backed solutions identify hidden talents in the system, increase social productivity that support country's long-term development, and introduce the best practices in psychology and child development globally to Asia, shaping the best AI personalized experts for Asian children.

Our cutting-edge AI-powered EdTech solutions seamlessly integrate into the current educational landscape, catering to children aged 0-12. We offer an array of innovative features, including AI gamified assessments and training, AI-driven personalized learning plans, an enhanced analytical system, an advanced 3D virtual holographic professional teacher, and specialized support for neurodiversity. With 1 in 6 children globally requiring special education—some of whom include iconic figures like Albert Einstein, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs—our platform addresses an urgent need exacerbated by incomplete evaluation systems in Asia.

By co-developing with esteemed professors from The Education University of Hong Kong (EdUHK) and a network of psychologists and professionals, Canpanion is at the forefront of educational innovation. Backed by leading organizations like HKSAR Digital Policy Office, Cyberport, CityU Tech 300, and CUHK, we are set to transform educational outcomes, impacting over 10 key stakeholders around each child. Partnering with 60+ industry leaders including prestigious advisors, schools, NGOs, government entities, professionals, educational centers, and organizations to create a brighter future for every child.

Canpanion 的目标是成为亚太地区最大的儿童发展和特殊教育需求 (SEN) 平台，促进量身定制的学习和神经多样性。我们拥有证据支撑的专业解决方案，能够发掘系统中潜藏的才能，提升支撑国家长远发展的社会生产力，同时向亚洲推广全球心理学及儿童发展领域的最佳实践，为亚洲儿童打造最优质的人工智能个性化成长助手。

我们先进的人工智能驱动的 EdTech 解决方案可无缝集成到当前的教育环境中，适合 0-12 岁的儿童。我们提供一系列创新功能，包括人工智能游戏化评估和训练、人工智能驱动的个性化学习计划、增强的分析系统、先进的 3D 虚拟专业教师以及对神经多样性的专业支持。全球六分之一的儿童（其中包括爱阿尔伯特·因斯坦、比尔·盖茨和史蒂夫·乔布斯等标志性人物）需要特殊教育，我们的平台针对亚洲评估系统不完善所加剧的这一迫切需求，提供了有效的解决方案。

Canpanion 由我们与香港教育大学 (EdUHK) 的知名教授和心理学家和专业人士网络共同开发，处于教育创新的前沿。在香港特别行政区数字政策办公室、数码港、CityU Tech 300 和香港中文大学等领先组织的支持下，我们将会改变教育成果，为每个儿童身边的 10 多个关键利益相关者带来福音。与 60 多个行业领导者合作，其中包括著名顾问、学校、非政府组织、政府实体、专业人士、教育中心和组织，为每个儿童创造更光明的未来。

Canthevac Limited, a start-up established in 2024, is the subsidiary company of Hong Kong Universal Vaccine (HKUV). HKUV, in turn, originated as a spin-off from the Centre for Virology, Vaccine, and Therapeutics (CVVT) and The University of Hong Kong. Our mission is to enhance global health and save lives from infectious diseases and cancers. We have established a novel Interferon-integrated Vaccine Platform (IVP),  and have successfully established a comprehensive framework for creating vaccines for infectious diseases and cancers.


康持生物有限公司是一家成立于 2024 年的初创公司，是Hong Kong Universal Vaccine (HKUV) 的子公司。HKUV 又起源于病毒学与疫苗研究中心 (CVVT) 和香港大学的衍生公司。我们的使命是增进全球健康，拯救传染病和癌症患者的生命。我们建立了一个新型干扰素整合疫苗平台 (IVP)，并成功建立了一个用于开发传染病和癌症疫苗的综合框架。

Inspired by the success of Malaysia's Mr. DIY, we aim to create a nationwide chain of accessible, affordable, and tech-enabled automotive stores. By combining retail convenience with digital transformation, Carage is set to become the go-to destination for car owners, mechanics, and enthusiasts alike.

column47: C10BX is a carbon asset developer founded in 2021, focused on large scale ecosystem protection and restoration through ecosystem assetization, defining nature as critical infrastructure.

CarePros is an award-winning care organization specializing in trauma-informed care, supporting children and youth with complex needs and high behavioral challenges. Our services include child intervention, foster and kinship care, respite care, and therapeutic support, delivered through personalized care plans designed to empower families and transform lives. We are an accredited, Certified B Corporation, recognized for meeting the highest standards of social and environmental impact. Named one of Canada’s Top Growing Companies by the Globe and Mail for four consecutive years, CarePros is a trusted leader in compassionate, high-quality care.

Nurture, a spin-off of CarePros, is an AI-enabled technology platform designed to modernize service delivery for care providers. By reducing administrative burdens by over 80% and cutting reporting time in half, Nurture’s intuitive platform empowers organizations to operate more efficiently. As the next-generation SaaS solution for social services, Nurture is transforming how care is delivered globally, ensuring more time and resources are dedicated to supporting those in need. Together, CarePros and Nurture are redefining care through compassion and cutting-edge technology.


CarePros 是一家屡获殊荣的医疗保健机构，专注于创伤知情护理，支持儿童和青少年的复杂需求，以及应对严重的行为挑战。我们的服务包括儿童干预、寄养和亲属护理、喘息服务和疗法支持，提供个性化护理计划，专为赋能家庭、改变生活而设计。我们是获得认证的 B 类公司，表示我们经认可符合社会和环境影响方面的最高标准。加拿大《环球邮报》连续四年将 CarePros 评为加拿大热门增长公司。我们是提供富于同情、优质卓越护理的前沿企业，深受信赖。

Nurture 是由 CarePros 拆分出的一家 AI 赋能技术平台，旨在进行护理供应商的服务交付现代化。Nurture 的直观平台通过降低超 80% 的行政负担和使报告时间缩短一半，赋能各家机构更加高效地运营。作为社会服务的下一代 SaaS 解决方案，Nurture 正在变革全球护理交付方式，确保更多的时间和资源流向需要支持的人群。CarePros 和 Nurture 齐心协力，正在运用同情心和前沿技术，共同改变护理的定义。

Cathoven AI, headquartered in the United States, also has branches in Hong Kong, Europe, and Turkey. Founded in 2022, Cathoven is a smart assistant tailored forlanguage educators, helping them create level-appropriate lessons and exams, assess and score student work, identify weaknesses, and provide actionable feedback. Usedby top institutions like Columbia Uni, Cathoven was ranked the second-best AI in Education project by QS after Duolingo.

Cathoven AI 的總部位於美國，同時在香港、歐洲及土耳其均設有分公司。公司成立於2022年，專為語言教育工作者量身打造，是一款高效智慧的AI助手。它能夠協助教師設計符合學生水準的課程與考試，對學生作業精准評估打分，識別學習短板，並提供系統性回饋指導。
這款工具已贏得哥倫比亞大學等眾多頂尖教育機構的青睞，並在QS排名中緊隨多鄰國之後，在教育人工智慧領域名稱列第二。

"Cathoven AI 的总部位于美国，同时在香港、欧洲及土耳其均设有分公司。公司成立于2022年，专为语言教育工作者量身打造，是一款高效智能的AI助手。它能够协助教师设计符合学生水平的课程与考试，对学生作业精准评估打分，识别学习短板，并提供系统性反馈指导。
这款工具已赢得哥伦比亚大学等众多顶尖教育机构的青睐，并在QS排名中紧随多邻国之后，在教育人工智能领域名列第二。"

column47: CTSCB is a government funded R&D centre, focusing on stem cell translation.

column3: Centre for Translational Stem Cell Biology
column47: Centre for Translational Stem Cell Biology (CTSCB) aims to develop world-leading new technologies in Hong Kong and to apply them to regenerative medicine, autoimmunity and genomic medicine under the golden age of research. By bringing together world-leading scientists and clinicians from Hong Kong, UK and other international collaborators who are studying stem cells and genomics, CTSCB strives to translate their discoveries into both commercial successes and healthcare benefits.

column47: CESOURCE Technical Private Limited is an Engineering and Consultancy company which is involved in the Design, Engineering, Consultancy and Innovation projects. We undertake multiple assignments in various disciplines of Management, Consultancy, Infrastructure and Technology based projects.

Cimple Biotechnology Limited (Cimple), a pioneering biotech firm spun off from the HK Tech 300 of CityUHK, Incu-Bio Programme of Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks Corporation (HKSTP) and Hong Kong Centre for Cerebro-Cardiovascular Health Engineering (COCHE), is at the forefront of innovation. Our founders, comprising Ph.D.s with extensive R&D experience in biosensing, are complemented by a team with expertise in R&D, production, and sales within the in vitro diagnostics (IVD) industry. Furthermore, our advisory board consists of medical professionals from the University of Hong Kong and the Chinese University of Hong Kong, as well as executives from leading global IVD companies.


芯普生物科技有限公司(Cimple) 是一家开创性的生物科技公司，经香港城市大学 HK Tech 300、香港科技园公司 (HKSTP) 的 Inuc-Bio 项目以及香港心脑血管健康工程研究中心(COCHE) 孵化成立，处于创新的前沿。

我们的创始团队由在生物传感领域拥有丰富研发经验的博士组成，此外还配备了一支在体外诊断 (IVD) 行业内具有研发、生产和销售经验的团队。  
与此同时，我们的顾问委员会由来自香港大学和香港中文大学的医学专家，以及来自全球领先的 IVD 企业的高管组成。

column47:
Coded Solution (V Systems) is a leading Web3.0 solutions company with teams in Malaysia, Hong Kong, China, US and Europe. Co-Founded by an inventor of the Proof-of-Stake consensus mechanism, the company leverages its deep blockchain and Web3.0 expertise to provide innovative, efficient, and secure digital solutions to enterprise customers, helping them accelerate their digital transformation journey. With a team of experienced professionals from the banking and corporate sectors, the company has built an excellent industry reputation and earned multiple awards. V Systems has established a robust digital ecosystem, serving as a solution provider and promoting integrated digital solutions through strategic partnerships, with a focus on Web3.0 tokenization, real-world assets (RWA), supply chain, and environmental, social, and governance initiatives (ESG).


V Systems是一家领先的Web3.0解决方案提供商,团队分布在马来西亚、香港、中国、美国和欧洲。该公司由proof-of-stake共识机制的发明者联合创立,依托其深厚的区块链和Web3.0专业知识,为企业客户提供创新、高效和安全的数字解决方案,帮助他们加速数字化转型。V Systems由一支具有银行和企业背景的经验丰富的专业团队组成,在行业中享有良好声誉,并获得多项奖项。该公司已经建立了一个强大的数字生态系统,不仅作为解决方案提供商,还通过战略合作伙伴关系来推动Web3.0代币化、实物资产、供应链以及环境、社会和公司治理(ESG)等领域的综合数字解决方案。总的来说,V Systems是一家致力于推动Web3.0创新应用的领先企业,凭借深厚的技术实力和专业团队,为客户提供卓越的数字化转型服务。

Cytonic is compatible with most blockchains such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana.It allows different transaction types to be processed together in a single block.Cytonic is a pioneering blockchain ecosystem designed to empower developers by providing a seamless environment for building, deploying, and scaling decentralized applications. Positioned as the "builder's chain," Cytonic addresses critical challenges such as virtual machine compatibility and liquidity management, facilitating rapid innovation. The platform supports multiple virtual machines (VMs), including EVM and SVM, enabling atomic cross-VM interoperability. With a focus on community-driven growth and user experience, Cytonic has attracted over 300,000 sign-ups since its launch. By offering robust support, educational resources, and a commitment to continuous improvement, Cytonic aims to lead the Layer 1 blockchain landscape and foster a vibrant ecosystem for decentralized technologies.


Cytonic 解决了虚拟机兼容性和流动性管理等关键挑战，促进快速创新。该平台支持多种虚拟机（VM），包括 EVM 和 SVM，实现原子级跨 VM 互操作性。Cytonic 专注于社区驱动的增长和用户体验，自推出以来已吸引超过 300,000 个注册用户。通过提供强大的支持、教育资源和对持续改进的承诺，Cytonic 旨在引领 Layer 1 区块链领域，并促进去中心化技术的蓬勃发展。

DeepTranslate is one of the industry’s leading artificial intelligence (“AI”) translation engines when it comes to English or Chinese financial domains. Our mission is to transform professional communication intelligently. With our cutting-edge deep learning technology and top-notch research and development, translation and linguistics team, we work together with our clients to enhance efficiency and provide opportunities for growth.

DeepTranslate was established in 2018. DeepTranslate adheres to its mission statement and continues to provide quality translations with the backing of a team of AI deep learning specialists, with industry leading experts Prof. Francis Chin and Dr. Bethany Chan heading the team; and a team of industry veterans, translators and linguists in financial printing industry under the leadership of Mr. Colin Hong.

We serve the major players in the Hong Kong’s financial industry through our comprehensive services, including AI translation, call figures feature, and automated construction of customised translation memory.

DeepTranslate has been accredited as a high potential startup by the Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks (HKSTP) and is honored to join the highly-competitive Leading Enterprises Acceleration Programme (LEAP) 2021, in order to strengthen its knowledge and skills in corporate management and business upscaling to accelerate its growth and development.

D-Engraver 专注于开发精准且安全的人工智能大型语言模型网络，为法律、金融及企业领域的专业人士量身定制。通过结合先进的人工智能与区块链技术，D-Engraver 提供法律研究、文件撰写和翻译等服务。公司总部位于香港科学园，并与 Microsoft 和罗宾逊律师事务所等行业领军企业合作，提供本地化人工智能解决方案，提高生产力并保障数据隐私。

Diginex is a disruptive impact tech business helping organisations to address the world’s most pressing ESG, climate and sustainability issues, utilising the latest AI technology to create efficiency and increase transparency.

Diginex’s frontier-pushing SaaS products are used by both companies and governments to tackle challenges including supply chain management, labour rights, due diligence, data management and corporate environmental responsibility. Its technology provides businesses who want to do better with the tools that both help them be more responsible, and to realise the commercial benefits of ESG, including greater efficiency, reduced corporate risk, and increased ability to attract and secure sustainable finance. By using its impact technology to understand their operations with help of reliable data, organisations can future proof their business models and accelerate growth, while contributing to a better future.

Diginex 是一家具有颠覆性影响的科技企业，帮助组织解决世界上最紧迫的 ESG、气候和可持续性问题，利用最新的人工智能技术提高效率和透明度。

Diginex 的前沿 SaaS 产品被公司和政府用于应对各种挑战，包括供应链管理、劳工权利、尽职调查、数据管理和企业环境责任等方面的挑战。Diginex 的技术为那些希望做得更好的企业提供了工具，帮助这些企业以更负责任的方式对待 ESG，并通过 ESG 实现商业利益，包括提高效率，降低企业风险，以及提高吸引和保障可持续金融的能力。通过利用其影响力技术，借助可靠的数据了解其运营，组织可以证明其商业模式并加速增长，同时为创造更美好的未来做出贡献。

Dynamic Vacuum Technology is a vacuum technology startup located at Hong Kong Science and Technology Park. We provides vacuum equipment solutions to semiconductor manufacturing.

Our patented Dynamic Vacuum (“DV”) pump provides reliable, cost-effective performance and energy-efficient unlike any other existing pumps in the market. The non-wearing design of DV pump does not require sealed chambers, hence “dynamic” vacuum, to generate vacuum over a wide range of pressure for modern industrial manufacturing processes.


Dynamic Vacuum Technology是一家位于香港科技园的真空技术初创公司。我们为半导体制造行业提供真空设备方案。

我们的专利Dynamic Vacuum（DV）泵提供可靠、具有成本效益和节能效果，与其他市场上的任何现有泵不同。DV泵的无磨损设计不需要密封腔，因此可以实施“动态”真空，在现代工业制造过程中广泛范围的压力下产生真空。

Ecoinno is a biotechnology company specializing in sustainable solutions that replace single-use plastics with our patented GCM® technology. Our 100% biodegradable plant-fiber material, GCM®, offers natural temperature tolerance, high tensile strength, and low oxygen transmission, all without coatings or chemical additives.

Ecoinno products are certified biodegradable (DIN EU, BPI, TUV, SGS Food Safety, HKP Plastic-Free, ISO) and are designed for functionality and user-friendliness. We serve a variety of sectors, including food and beverage, airline catering, food packaging (frozen and chill), and pharmaceutical package, providing zero plastic solution to meet diverse industrial and engineering needs.


Ecoinno是一家生物技术公司，专注提供可持续方案，利用我们专利的GCM®技术取代一次性塑料制品。我们的100%可生物降解植物纤维材料，GCM®，具有天然的耐温性、高拉伸强度和低氧气透过率，且无需涂层或化学添加剂。

Ecoinno产品经过认证，可生物降解（DIN EU、BPI、TUV、SGS食品安全、HKP无塑料、ISO），设计实用且用户友好。我们为食品和饮料、航空餐饮、食品包装（冷冻和冷藏）以及药品包装等多个领域提供服务，为满足各种工业和工程需求提供零塑料方案。

The film and video production industry is evolving rapidly, driven by globalization and emerging technologies like AI. However, this exciting shift presents three critical challenges:

Sourcing Resources Globally: Filmmakers struggle to find trusted crew, equipment, and suppliers in unfamiliar locations, often leading to delays and inefficiencies.
Navigating Regulations: Every filming location has unique legal requirements and cultural nuances, making compliance difficult and risking project overruns or cancellations.
Integrating AI into Workflows: While AI offers incredible creative possibilities, there’s no seamless way to connect modern tools like generative AI with traditional production workflows, resulting in inefficiencies and missed creative opportunities.
Storyvord solves these challenges by offering an AI-powered platform that integrates production management, operations, and creative workflows. We connect filmmakers with global resources, provide real-time compliance guidance, and enhance creativity with tools like previsualization and AI-driven shot planning—all in one seamless solution

Emnotion is a cutting-edge climate intelligence company founded in 2016 in Israel, specializing in advanced quantum-based climate modeling. Its proprietary SaaS platform integrates Big Data, AI, Machine Learning, GIS, and Quantum Mechanics to deliver highly accurate forecasts and actionable insights for climate risk management. With over 80% prediction accuracy, Emnotion supports sectors like energy, trading, insurance, agriculture, logistics, and water management, optimizing decision-making and sustainability. By addressing challenges in climate resilience and resource efficiency, Emnotion empowers businesses and governments globally to adapt to dynamic environmental conditions while fostering long-term economic and ecological stability.

Emnotion 是一家领先的气候情报公司，于 2016 年在以色列成立，专门从事基于量子的高级气候建模。其专有的 SaaS 平台集成了大数据、人工智能、机器学习、GIS 和量子力学，为气候风险管理提供高度准确的预测和可操作的见解。Emnotion 的预测准确率超过 80%，支持能源、贸易、保险、农业、物流和水资源管理等行业，优化决策和可持续性。通过应对气候适应力和资源效率方面的挑战，Emnotion 使全球企业和政府能够适应动态环境条件，同时促进长期的经济和生态稳定。

EmoEx is an AI-driven mental health and wellness platform designed to support individuals with diverse needs through advanced, empathetic digital companions. Combining insights from top psychologists and healthcare professionals with state-of-the-art AI, EmoEx offers users personalised support and professional advice. The platform features social companions for emotional engagement and pro characters for specialised, evidence-based care, fostering mental and physical well-being. EmoEx aims to revolutionise accessible healthcare by providing flexible solutions that empower users, companies, and communities to enhance overall wellness. Accessible on mobile, EmoEx bridges technology and compassion to offer a unique, transformative health experience across Asia and beyond.


EmoEx 是一个基于人工智能驱动的心理健康和健康平台，旨在通过先进、富有同理心的数字伴侣为具有不同需求的个人提供支持。EmoEx将顶尖心理学家和医疗专业人士的见解与最先进的人工智能相结合，为用户提供个性化支持和专业建议。该平台设有社交伴侣以进行情感交流，以及专业角色进行专业的循证护理，促进心理和身体健康。EmoEx旨在通过提供灵活的解决方案来彻底改变医疗保健的可及性，使用户、公司和社区能够提高整体健康水平。 EmoEx可通过移动设备上进行访问，将技术与同理心结合，为亚洲及其他地区提供独特的变革性的健康体验。

Endowus is Asia's leading wealth management fund platform. Founded in 2017 and headquartered in Singapore, Endowus provides investors with expert advice and access to institutional financial solutions at low and fair fees, through a personalised digital wealth experience. Licensed by the Securities and Futures Commission of Hong Kong and the Monetary Authority of Singapore, Endowus is backed by investors including UBS, Citi Ventures, MUFG, Singapore's Economic Development Board Investments, Softbank Asia and more. As of Oct 2024, the Endowus Group has assets under advice of over US$7 billion and serves over tens of thousands of clients. 

Endowus 智安投是亚洲领先的财富管理及基金平台，首创不收取销售佣金的业务模式，并分别获香港证监会及新加坡金融管理局的牌照许可。 创立于2017年，总部位于新加坡的Endowus透过个性化的线上体验，让投资者以公平、合理以及更低的价钱，取得专业机构投资者级别的产品和投顾服务，从而实现财富增长。 截至2024年10月，Endowus集团旗下管理资产超过70亿美元，并为数以千万计客户提供服务，为亚洲最大的独立财富管理公司之一。

column33: Financial Technology,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology
column47:
EnergyGlare was founded to provide unique and critical tools to enable the global transition to a Carbon 
Net Zero Economy over the next 30 years. 

In the heart of EnergyGlare is the blockchain technology that allows us to introduce key innovations such 
as smart contracts implementation of ESCo and project verification, tokenization of energy/carbon saving projects to allow a secondary market, decentralization and streamlining of payments, and digitalization of carbon assets.

EnergyGlare has also developed a specialized AI agent to perform energy audits on behalf of clients who 
do not have the budget for a consultant. The AI agent also performs due diligence and verify viability of projects and solutions.

EnergyGlare is an investment and collaboration platform that:

1. Creates the first ecosystem that includes all key stakeholders in the decarbonization industry (Project Owners, Investors and Service Providers).
2. Enables all companies, regardless of size and location, to fund their decarbonization projects and pitch to a large pool of investors directly.
3. Allows all companies and individuals to invest in decarbonization projects directly.
4. Projects can ask for quotations and hire Service Providers (consultants, contractors, solution providers, etc.) directly from the EnergyGlare marketplace.
5. Provides an autonomous AI agent to perform due diligence and verify viability of projects and solutions. The EnergyGlare AI also performs energy audits and proposes decarbonization projects on 
behalf Project Owners. 
6. Creates the world’s 1st secondary market for energy contracts that allows trading of ongoing contracts & enables ESCO-backed derivatives.
7. Tracks energy and carbon emission savings and issues tokenized carbon credits.
8. Avoid greenwashing by rewarding projects according to their actual carbon performance.
9. As per estimated global carbon price, issue equivalent amount of EGT token to project stakeholders.
10. Digitalizes and modernizes the classic ESCO model and implements it through the EnergyGlare Smart Contracts.


EnergyGlare的成立旨在提供独特而关键的工具，帮助全球
在未来30年向零碳碳经济转型。

EnergyGlare的核心是区块链技术，使我们能够引入关键创新，例如：
ESCo的智能合约实施以及项目验证；节能/节碳项目代币化以实现二级市场；分散和简化支付；碳资产的数字化。

EnergyGlare还开发了专门的AI代理，以便为
没有顾问预算的客户实施能源审计。AI代理还执行尽职调查并验证项目和解决方案的可行性。

EnergyGlare是一个投资和协作平台，它：

1. 创建了第一个生态系统，其中汇聚了脱碳行业的所有关键利益相关者（项目负责人、投资者和服务提供商）。
2. 使所有公司（无论规模和地点如何）都能为其脱碳项目提供资金，并直接向大量投资者融资。
3. 允许所有公司和个人直接投资脱碳项目。
4. 项目可以直接从EnergyGlare市场索取报价并聘请服务提供商（顾问、承包商、解决方案提供商等）。
5. 提供自主AI代理，以执行尽职调查并验证项目和解决方案的可行性。EnergyGlare AI还执行能源审计，并
代表项目负责人
提出脱碳项目提案。
6. 创造了全球最大的能源合约二级市场，允许交易正在履行的合同并支持依托于ESCO的衍生品。
7. 跟踪节能和碳减排，并发行代币化的碳信用。
8. 根据项目的实际碳绩效来奖励项目，避免漂绿。
9. 根据估计的全球碳价格，向项目利益相关者发放等量的EGT代币。
10. 实现经典ESCO模式的数字化和现代化，并通过EnergyGlare Smart Contracts实施。

column33: Financial Technology,Manufacturing Technology,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology
column47: Entoq has an innovative patent-pending process for the complete treatment of Mixed Solid Waste (MSW) in a scalable and commercially viable system. Thirty percent of MSW is food and other organics, and Entoq's process utilizes Black Soldier Fly (BSF) larvae to efficiently remove organics from the waste stream in a continuous process. Recyclables are sorted for reuse, and the organic nutrients recovered by the BSF larvae are converted into sustainable bio-products, including animal feed, fertilizer and bio-fuel. The bio-cleaned plastics from the waste stream are treated in a semi-pyrolysing process to create Syncoal™, a dense solid with a high energy density and few impurities. Syncoal™ recovers hydrogen and carbon from the waste stream for use in chemical industries, metal smelting and as a sustainable energy alternative. Processing facilities can be co-located at landfills for an efficient diversion of waste from sequestration into recovery and reuse.

We transform vocal cord vibrations into signals.

The Hummingbird, Expertiqa’s flagship product, is a Class I assistive technology device transforming accessibility for non-verbal individuals with severe physical disabilities.

Utilizing vocal cord vibration detection, the Hummingbird converts these signals into actionable outputs, enabling communication and control of devices like computers and AAC systems. The device features a user-friendly design, including a comfortable neckband and durable materials, and operates effectively in noisy environments. It offers versatile connectivity via Bluetooth, USB, and switch output cables. Clinically validated through trials at Holland Bloorview Kids Rehabilitation Hospital, the Hummingbird has demonstrated efficacy, safety, and user satisfaction. With support from institutions like the Ontario Brain Institute and BioNext Accelerator, Expertiqa is advancing accessibility and independence for individuals with disabilities while addressing critical gaps in the AAC device market.

Expertiqa Technologies Inc. 是一家加拿大安的医疗科技初创公司，致力于无障碍领域的创新。公司专注于将学术研究成果转化为具有实际影响力的辅助技术。其旗舰产品Hummingbird是一款开创性的设备，专为无法语言交流且患有严重肢体残疾的人士设计。该设备通过先进的声带振动检测技术，帮助用户实现交流，并能够操控电脑及 AAC 等辅助设备。Expertiqa 坚持以人为本的设计理念，依托卓越的工程技术和医疗创新，为构建无障碍环境提供解决方案，满足特殊群体的实际需求。此产品已通过临床试验验证，并已证明其有效性、安全性和用户满意度。

FlashGreen Discount Supermarket

Founded in 2021 by university students, FlashGreen Discount Supermarket is a social enterprise committed to environmental sustainability. We integrate surplus production resources to provide high-quality products at reduced prices, helping to minimize waste and lessen our ecological footprint. Beyond our retail stores, we created a mobile app that pairs with self-service vending machines to sell near-expiry items, earning recognition at the Geneva Invention Exhibition for our innovation. These vending machines are strategically placed in schools, offices, and shopping malls to advocate for food conservation and waste reduction. In 2023, FlashGreen garnered significant accolades, including the Champion title at the Hong Kong Social Enterprise Challenge, First Prize in the Hong Kong University Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition, and the Most Socially Impactful Award at the Chinese University of Hong Kong Entrepreneurship Competition, highlighting our commitment to making a positive social

FlashGreen 临期折扣店由几位大学生于 2021 年创立，致力于环保和减少浪费。我们整合生 产过剩资源，提供消费者优质商品，以优惠价格减轻地球负担。除了实体折扣零售店，我 们还研发了手机应用程序，结合自助售卖机，销售临期产品，这项创新获得瑞士日内瓦发明 展奖。售卖机已部署于学校、办公室和商场，积极宣传惜食和减废理念。 FlashGreen 在 2023 年获得多项荣誉，包括香港社会企业挑战赛冠军、香港大学生创新及创业大赛社会企 业一等奖，以及香港中文大学创业竞赛最有社会影响力大奖。

Our lead product, FTB-728, is a novel nanocarrier system showing promising results in early testing for atherosclerosis treatment. 
The technology combines:
- Enhanced drug delivery efficiency
- Real-time therapeutic monitoring
- Potential applications across multiple inflammatory diseases

Current Stage:

- Established collaborations with leading research institutions in US, Singapore, and Malaysia

- Long-term: Development of therapeutic applications

Green Vigor has developed a breakthrough and patented technology – Energy Recycle System called “Hydropower Intelli-Recycle System” (HPiRS) turns neglected hydropower into green energy in a building. For large scale decarbonization in Urban Area, HPiRS plays a crucial role in this effort by recycling the untapped energy used for transporting water within buildings. HPiRS is a small, intelligent hydropower system be built in a building, which can recycle the power from water go into water tank. The amount of fresh and sea water used by inhabitants will generate to electricity directly. Make money when use water in every water tank.


Green Vigor已经开发出一项突破性和获得专利的技术— 能源回收系统，名为“水力智能回收系统”（HPiRS），将废弃的水力能源转化为建筑中的绿色能源。对于城市的大规模脱碳，HPiRS发挥着至关重要的作用— 通过回收建筑内用于输送水的未开发能源。HPIRS 是一种小型智能水电系统，可以安装在建筑中，通过回收进入水箱的水产生电能。居民使用的淡水和海水的量将直接转化为电力。而每次使用水箱中的水都可以从中赚钱。

Guangzhou Hua Cai Network Technology Co., Ltd. was established in Guangzhou in August 2004 and has been dedicated to contributing its strength to the construction of digital government and digitization of enterprises for over twenty years. The company provides comprehensive solutions for digital village construction, rural revitalization, and digital transformation. It offers implementation, consultation, software development, AI intelligent hardware development, and new quality productivity services.

The company has invested heavily in research and development, creating an AI digital village software platform and a rural revitalization big data platform that are completely domestically produced and break through foreign chokehold technologies. They have core technology under their control, ensuring security and leading international technology based on 5G internet, Beidou satellite navigation technology, big data, cloud computing, AI/artificial intelligence, and the Internet of Things.

The corporate mission is to build digital villages to empower rural revitalization, develop advanced digital technologies to serve agriculture-related work well, and promote farmer employment, income increase, and wealth creation.

The corporate vision is to innovate scientific artificial intelligence technology, bring the world into Chinese rural areas, push Chinese rural areas to the world, promote the modern development of Chinese-style agriculture, continuously invest in R&D funds, develop innovative technological products, serve the world to eliminate human poverty, and construct a community with a shared future for mankind.广州和财网络科技有限公司于2004年8月在广州成立，为数字政府、数字化企业建设贡献自己的力量、提供全面数字乡村、乡村振兴数智化建设解决方案\实施\咨询、软件、AI智能硬件开发、提新质生产力服务。

企业愿景：研发创新科学人工智能技术、把世界带进中国农村、把中国农村推向世界，推动中国式农业现化发展，持续投入研发资金，研发创新科技产品，服务全世界消除人类贫穷，构建人类命运共同体。

column33: Food and Agriculture,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology
column47:
HakkoBako is an innovative company revolutionizing the use of fermentation technology. Our advanced fermentation chambers are designed to transform food waste into valuable products for both culinary and biotech applications. By enabling precise control of temperature and humidity, our technology ensures consistent and reliable fermentation processes. This allows for the creation of unique flavors in fine dining, sustainable food products, and even industrial-scale biotech solutions.
We aim to tackle global food waste by repurposing materials like bread waste, coffee bean chaff, and vegetable peelings into high-value ingredients. Collaborating with chefs, researchers, and food developers, HakkoBako empowers flavor innovation while supporting sustainability.
Our long-term vision includes expanding into consumer-friendly products, lab-scale systems, and large-scale fermentation solutions for the precision fermentation industry. At HakkoBako, we believe in shaping a sustainable future by merging the worlds of food and technology.

HakkoBako 是一家創新公司，致力於革新發酵技術的應用。我們的先進發酵設備專為將食物廢料轉化為高價值產品而設計，適用於餐飲和生物科技領域。透過精準控制溫度與濕度，我們的技術確保了穩定可靠的發酵過程，並促進了獨特風味的創造，例如高端餐飲中的創新美食、可持續食品產品，甚至是工業規模的生物技術解決方案。
我們的目標是解決全球食物浪費問題，通過重新利用如麵包廢料、咖啡豆殼和蔬菜果皮等材料，將其轉化為高價值的原料。HakkoBako 與廚師、研究人員及食品開發者合作，賦能味道創新，同時支持可持續發展。
我們的長期願景包括開發適用於消費者的產品、實驗室規模的系統以及針對精密發酵行業的大規模解決方案。HakkoBako 相信，通過結合食品與科技的力量，我們能共同塑造更可持續的未來。

column47:
Hangzhou Hengke filter environment protection Co.,LTD,  is located in Floor 3, block A, Wangjing business center, Qianjiang century town, Xiaoshan District, Hangzhou established in 2001, collection of scientific research, development, production, trade into an organic whole.It mainly researches and develops hi-tech filter, dust removal products and gradually develop other comprehensive environmental protection projects .The company has large- scale production base. It relies on scientific research strength of ZheJiang University, introduces American first-class production equipment and incessantly pursue international advanced technology. As one industry incubation base of ZheJiang University, Hengke is a star company in filtration industry.                                                                                                   
杭州恒科环保技术有限公司坐落于钱塘江沿岸的钱江世纪城。公司成立于2001年，集科研、开发、生产、贸易于一体，主要研制开发高科技滤料、除尘设备产品，逐步发展污水处理，垃圾处理等综合环保治理项目。公司具有大型的生产基地，依托浙江大学雄厚的科研力量，引进美国一流的生产设备，时刻追踪国际先进生产技术，是浙江大学技术产业孵化基地之一，浙江滤料环保行业的明星企业。
公司成立以来，坚持至诚至信、精益求精、以人为本、追求卓越的宗旨，严把质量关，坚持做高品质产品。具有各种工业滤布，环保除尘布200万平方米的生产能力，可用于板框压滤机、真空带式过滤机、盘式过滤机、离心机、袋式除尘等各类设备。被广泛的应用与化工、制糖、制药、冶金、钢铁、建材、炭黑等行业的液液分离、粉尘收理、产品畅销全国，远销东南亚、欧美。

"Inovat is a digital tax refund solution that helps travellers save time and money when shopping abroad. Customers can claim tax refunds by simply taking a picture of the receipt.

Our unique competitive advantage lies in our distribution network. Through API integration with leading banks and travel companies, we seamlessly embed tax refund capabilities into the apps travellers already use. This allows customers to manage their tax-free shopping directly through their preferred banking or travel applications."

"Inovat 是一个数字退税解决方案，帮助旅客在国外购物时节省时间和金钱。顾客只需拍摄收据照片即可申请退税。
我们独特的竞争优势在于我们的分销网络。通过与领先的银行和旅游公司进行 API 整合，我们将退税功能无缝嵌入旅客已在使用的应用程序中。这使顾客能够直接通过其首选的银行或旅游应用程序管理免税购物。"

Vavita is a regulated fintech focused on solving financial problems faced by consumers in emerging markets. Cross-border payments can be expensive, inconvenient and risky, even though this $100bn+ market is highly lucrative.

We are a nanofiber research and manufacturing company. Nanofibers are on the cusp of transitioning from a novel, mainly lab-based technology, to an industrial-scale material. We at Keno Nanofiber Company Limited aims to bring a whole new line of nanomaterials into the market for the world. To ensure a smooth transition, we invested in our own line of electrospinning technology that can produce high quality nanofibers on an industrial scale. Nanofiber materials can provide higher functions with fewer materials, accelerating progress into lighter and better products.
One of our projects in nanofiber materials is a nanofiber-based filter-media, which can bring HEPA quality air with your existing HVAC system.
You may email us for inquires in our latest projects, products, or consultations in the utility of nanofiber materials.

我们是一家纳米纤维研究和制造公司。纳米纤维正站在从新颖的实验室技术迈向工业化规模材料应用的转折点上。Keno Nanofiber Company Limited 的目标是向全球市场推出一系列全新的纳米材料。为了确保顺利过渡，我们自主研发了电纺技术系列，能够实现工业规模的高质量纳米纤维生产。纳米纤维材料性能卓越，能够有效减少材料使用量，进而加速打造出更轻便、更优质的产品。
我们的一项纳米纤维材料项目是开发出基于纳米纤维的过滤介质，该介质能够适配现有的暖通空调系统，提供 HEPA 级别的空气质量。
如需咨询我们的最新项目或产品，或者咨询纳米纤维材料的效用，可以向我们发送电子邮件。

KIN Farm’s mission is to find a way to systemically reduce the carbon footprint of food – a critical transformation that is required globally. Our model is to source, finance and export major food ingredient categories from better farms. And enable these ingredients to get into our target markets and then use our brand, network, reputation and energy to catalyse the sales momentum for our partner distributors to build on. We put the ingredients into both food service and retail channels. We have validated this model with Eggs and Liquid Eggs, and we are now expanding this to other food categories such as sustainable Trout and Shrimp, with more in development mode in the pipeline, such as Sustainable farmed Cod, Bluefin Tuna and Amberjack.

KIN Farm 立志找到一种系统地减少食品碳足迹的方法——这是全球都需要的一项关键转变。我们的模式是采购、资助和出口来自更好的农场的各类主要食材。使这些食材能够进入我们的目标市场，然后利用我们的品牌、网络、声誉和能源来推动我们的合作伙伴分销商的销售势头。我们会将食材投放到食品服务渠道和零售渠道。我们已经用蛋类和液态蛋验证了这种模式，现在我们正在将其扩展到其他食品类别（例如，以可持续方式养殖的鳟鱼和虾），更多的食品类别正处于开发模式，例如，以可持续方式养殖的鳕鱼、蓝鳍金枪鱼和琥珀鱼。

我们的方案专注于解决一个简单但极其重要的问题，即打破流量来源和基于位置的商家之间的壁垒。

这个问题之所以重要，一方面是因为年轻人和下一代消费者将会越来越多地依赖这些流量来源获取信息，另一方面，以旅游消费为代表，我们面向的市场规模的每年的总额都超过一万亿美元。

Kokoxili Photonics Limited is a high-tech startup incubated by City University of Hong Kong, primarily focused on the development of next-generation ultra-high-speed thin-film lithium niobate integrated photonic chips. The company boasts a team of members from top international universities such as Harvard University and City University of Hong Kong, all holding PhDs. The team includes Professor Wang Cheng, a pioneer in thin-film lithium niobate integrated photonic technology; Dr. Zhang Ke, an expert in lithium niobate optical frequency comb chips; Dr. Chen Chaoxi, a specialist in lithium niobate chip fabrication; and Dr. Feng Hanke, an expert in lithium niobate microwave photonics. Their expertise covers the entire process of lithium niobate chips, including chip design, processing, and testing.

Kunlun New Energy Materials Co., Ltd. was established in 2004 in Xianghe County, Langfang, Hebei Province. The company currently owns eight wholly-owned and partially-owned subsidiaries, including Huzhou Kunlun Yienke Battery Materials Co., Ltd., Yibin Kunlun New Energy Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Yibin Kunlun"), and KunlunChem Hungary Kft.

The company's main business activity is the development of electrolyte solutions for secondary lithium batteries. The battery types they serve include automotive power batteries, energy storage batteries, small power batteries, and 3C digital batteries. Additionally, they cover sodium batteries and solid-state batteries, including cylindrical, pouch, and prismatic aluminum shell formats. The company currently has an electrolyte production capacity of 180,000 tons per year and ranked fourth in the electrolyte industry in China in 2023.

KunlunChem (Hungary) Kft. was established in October 2023 as a wholly-owned subsidiary of Yibin Kunlun New Energy Co., Ltd. The electrolyte factory in Hungary has a planned total capacity of 100,000 tons per year.


昆仑新能源材料股份有限公司成立于2004年，位于河北省廊坊市香河县。该公司目前拥有八家全资和部分控股子公司，包括湖州昆仑亿恩科电池材料有限公司、宜宾昆仑新能源有限公司（以下简称“宜宾昆仑”）和昆仑化学匈牙利有限公司。

公司的主要业务是开发用于二次锂电池的电解液研发。服务的电池类型包括汽车动力电池、储能电池、小功率电池和3C数码电池。此外，他们还涵盖钠电池和固态电池，包括圆柱形、软包装和长方体铝壳格式。该公司目前的电解液年产能为18万吨，在2023年中国电解液行业中排名第四。

昆仑化学（匈牙利）有限公司宜宾昆仑新能源有限公司成立于2023年10月，为宜宾昆仑新能源有限公司的全资子公司，匈牙利电解液工厂规划总产能为每年10万吨。

McLantis Group is focused in the designing, developing and production of high performance pre-press equipments, laser imaging equipments, digital printing machine and consumables, including CTP machine, CTCP machine, CTS machine, digital printing machine, LDI machine, auxiliary washing machine, auxiliary drying oven, offset printing plate, conventional PS plate, CTP plate, CTCP plate, screen printing emulsion etc. And, we commit to the development and research in laser photonics, imaging, material handling, robotics and automation. McLantis Group 专注于设计、开发和生产高性能的印前设备、激光成像设备、数字印刷机和耗材，包括CTP机、CTCP机、CTS机、数字印刷机、LDI机、辅助洗版机、辅助烘干炉、胶印版、常规PS版、CTP版、CTCP版、丝网印刷感光乳胶等。我们致力于激光光子学、成像、物料处理、机器人技术和自动化的开发和研究。目前，McLantis掌握了几项核心技术，包括激光MEMS微封装技术、DLP数字处理系统技术、高精度镜头技术和精密运动控制系统，并获得了多项专利和软件版权。多年来，McLantis一直在印刷行业、PCB行业和各种制造业领域为全球客户提供支持。

McLantis Group是一家印前设备、激光成像设备、数字印刷机和耗材的工厂集团。McLantis Group由上海McLantis Printing Technology Co.,Ltd、上海亚星印刷版厂、江苏MIGAS激光技术工厂和北京麒麟软件技术有限公司等公司共同创立成为一家印前解决方案提供商。并且还在北京和江苏建立了激光技术研发中心。

McLantis Group是中英合资企业，在中国拥有一体化生产和研发基地。我们充分了解国际标准，并采用标准技术开展工作。此外，经过多年累积的经验使我们对国际印刷、电子和MEMS市场的前沿技术有了独特的理解。

Negawatt started as an AIoT startup specializing in ESG with smart city solutions. Using proptech (Negawatt BOS) to accelerate digital transformation for landlord and building occupants to drive quantifiable ESG impact. To scale impact, we launched the B2B2C ESG GameFi app Zero2, incentivizing users with merchant discounts. This fosters sustainable behavior changes, allowing us to digitize impact for future endeavors.

By gamifying sustainability, Zero2 aims to create an ecosystem that aligns and incentivizes the interests of individuals, merchants, corporates, schools, NGOs, and third-party infrastructure partners for a net-zero future. The app encourages users to complete missions and adopt offline behaviors such as recycling, green dining, plastic-free shopping, utility bill reduction, and promoting physical health and education. All actions are digitized to capture citywide ESG contributions and impact.

Upon completing these eco-friendly missions, users are rewarded with coins and shopping coupons, This boosts foot traffic and supports businesses, creating a circular economy. Additionally, Zero2 provides ESG impact reports to participating organizations, allowing them to align their practices with sustainability goals.


Negawatt 始于 AIoT（人工智能物联网）创业，专攻 ESG 领域，打造智慧城市解决方案。运用地产技术 (Negawatt BOS) 加速地产所有者和使用者数字转型，带来可量化的 ESG 影响。为量化影响，我们推出了 B2B2C ESG 加密区块链游戏金融应用程序 Zero2，使用商户折扣激励用户。这可以培育可持续的行为变革，让我们能够数字化未来工作的影响。

Zero2 游戏化可持续发展，旨在打造一种生态系统，对齐并激励个人、商户、企业、学校、NGO 和第三方基础设施合作伙伴的利益，共同打造净零排放的未来。这一应用程序鼓励用户完成任务并接纳多种线下行为，例如回收、绿色餐饮、无塑购物、节约公共事业资源和促进生理健康与教育。所有行动均纳入数字记录，用以了解城市内的 ESG 贡献和影响。

完成这些环保任务时，用户可以获得金币和购物优惠券。这能够增加顾客流量并支持业务，进而打造循环经济。此外，Zero2 还向参与的机构提供 ESG 影响报告，助力其对齐自身实践和可持续目标。

At Netaxis Group Ltd, a Cyprus-based firm, we specialize in acquiring and leasing IPv4 addresses to data centers, hosting providers, and telecommunication companies.

IPv4 addresses are the backbone of global Internet communication, built on a mathematical model from the 1970s. With the global IPv4 address pool becoming increasingly scarce, these digital assets have grown in both demand and strategic importance.

We are actively seeking private equity, debt financing, HNWIs and family offices to join us in building exceptional value in the future of digital infrastructure.

This is a unique alternative investment opportunity, offering monthly yields and backed by a depreciating yet increasingly scarce asset class with strong market fundamentals.

以下是您推介信息和讯息的精炼版本，其中增加了关于投资机会的要点：

Netaxis Group Ltd 是一家总部位于塞浦路斯的公司，专门为数据中心、托管提供商和电信公司购买和租赁 IPv4 地址。

IPv4 地址是全球互联网通信的支柱，基于 20 世纪 70 年代兴起的数学模型构建而成。随着全球 IPv4 地址池日益稀缺，这些数字资产的需求和战略重要性都在增长。

我们正在积极寻找私募股权、债务融资、高净值人士和家族办公室与我们合作，携手在未来的数字基础设施中创造卓越价值。

这是一个独特的另类投资机会，提供月度收益，并有不断贬值但日益稀缺的资产类别作为支持，具有强劲的市场基本面。

Neubit, founded in 2020, specializes in personalized biofeedback therapy for managing stress-related mental disorders, focusing on alcohol use disorder (AUD). Its home-use solution integrates haptic biofeedback, wearable sensors, and machine learning (ML) for continuous monitoring and nervous system regulation. The approach combines ANS measurement, ML analysis, and active stimulation to enhance clinic services and address gaps in non-pharmaceutical treatments. Neubit’s digital biofeedback technology has shown promising results in pre-clinical trials, including improved sleep, reduced stress, and a 42.86% decrease in alcohol cravings. By 2032, the company aims to serve 100,000 patients through 500 clinics, potentially saving €310 million annually in mental health costs. Led by a multidisciplinary team with deep expertise in technology, medicine, and entrepreneurship, Neubit collaborates with Mehiläinen and global hardware partners to revolutionize mental health care. Recognized by the EIC’s Seal of Excellence, the company is poised for significant impact.


Neubit 成立于 2020 年，专注于通过个性化的生物反馈疗法管理压力相关的心理 障碍，重点解决酒精使用障碍（AUD）问题。其家用解决方案集成了触觉生物反 馈、可穿戴传感器和机器学习（ML），实现持续监测和自主神经系统（ANS）调 节。该方法结合了 ANS 测量、ML 分析和主动刺激，提升了诊所服务质量并填补 了非药物治疗的空白。 
Neubit 的数字化生物反馈技术在临床前试验中表现出积极成果，包括改善睡眠、 减轻压力以及酒精渴望降低 42.86%。到 2032 年，公司计划通过欧洲的 500 家诊 所服务 10 万名患者，有望每年节省 3.1 亿欧元的心理健康相关成本。 由技术、医学和创业领域的多学科专家组成的团队领导，Neubit 与 Mehiläinen 及全球硬件合作伙伴合作，致力于革新心理健康护理。作为欧洲创新委员会卓越 印章（Seal of Excellence）的获奖者，公司正在为实现重大影响做好准备。

Neuron Digital Group is a prominent provider of advanced smart building management solutions.

Designed for seamless monitoring and compatibility across diverse hardware systems, the platform brings together advanced building analytics software and energy management systems, upholding efficiency, sustainability, and adherence to building ESG principles.

该平台旨在实现跨不同硬件系统的无缝监控和兼容性，将先进的楼宇分析软件和能源管理系统结合在一起，保持效率、可持续性并遵守楼宇ESG原则。

Our services are tailored to meet the needs of businesses globally, enabling efficient and reliable financial operations. NOTA 是一家领先的加拿大金融服务公司，专注于提供安全且流畅的跨境交易。我们提供全面的解决方案，包括国际汇款、外汇（FX）、子账户开立以及第三方支付。我们的服务专为全球企业设计，帮助实现高效和可靠的财务操作。NOTA 确保遵守国际监管标准，并优先考虑客户的安全与满意。

NOVUS strives to deliver quality veterinary and medical orthopedic products with advanced biomaterial technologies incl. cuttting-edge 3D bioprinting filaments. Aside from its stengths in hard tissue innovation, Novus will be focusing also on soft tissue filaments for bioprinting.

Numbers Protocol is an open and decentralized protocol designed to ensure the provenance of all types of creative works generated by humans and AI. Our solution, Capture, is tailored for the AI era and supported by Nvidia Inception and Google News Programs. By leveraging AI and blockchain technologies, Capture guarantees the transparency and authenticity of digital media. It is easy to integrate and allows users to verify content sources with a single click, enhancing trust and protecting digital assets. Additionally, Capture unlocks new monetization opportunities and helps foster a new digital trust economy.


Numbers Protocol 是一个开源且去中心化的协议，专为确保人类和 AI 生成的各类创作作品的来源真实性而设计。解决方案 Capture 专为 AI 时代量身打造，并获得 Nvidia Inception 和 Google News Program 的支持。通过结合 AI 和区块链技术，Capture 能够保证数位媒体的透明性与真实性。其整合简单，用户只需点击一次即可验证内容来源，从而增强信任并保护数位资产。此外，Capture 还提供了新的变现机会，帮助促进新型数位信任经济的发展。

Induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs)
Our state-of-the-art platform leverages iPSC-derived cells to revolutionize the drug discovery and development process, offering unparalleled precision, efficiency, and relevance.

OKOsix is a featured startup at Hong Kong Science and Technology Park. We tackle the plastic crisis by replacing fossil-based plastics in various applications with our cost-effective, 90% carbon-saving, and disposable/durable biobased materials. 

OKOsix makes:
1.	Fully and truly biodegradable OKOmers for making compostable disposable products in medical, personal care and hygiene industries including bags, medical masks / gowns, drapes, cosmetic facial masks and other non-woven products;
2.	Green plastics (OKO-PE, OKO-PP, OKO-ABS…) for durable products in packaging, automotive, construction, consumer goods, electronics and electrical appliances etc.

OKOsix also offers service to upgrade recycled plastic materials, improving the value of recycled plastics, unlocking more profitability for different parties.

Olea, a digital infrastructure platform, channels global liquidity to support trade and supply chain finance. Incubated by SC Ventures, Olea adopts robust risk management and governance that is compatible with international financial institutions and innovates the delivery of trade finance as an asset class to access wider, alternative liquidity pools, as well as leveraging advanced technology to remove the friction in trade finance. 

The vision of Olea is to empower sustainable trade. Olea also supports suppliers and buyers across 35 countries. Olea Global (Hong Kong) Limited focuses on sales activities in the Greater China market.


浩立是一家提供全球资金流动渠道，有利贸易及供应链融资的数码平台。公司由SC Ventures孵化成立，并奉行完善的风险管理和管治标准，获得环球金融机构认可。公司亦积极支持贸易融资资产类别的创新发展，以扩大另类流动资金池，同时利用先进科技解决贸易融资的痛点。
浩立锐意推动可持续贸易发展。此外，浩立也为35个国家的供应商及买家提供支援服务。浩立环球（香港）有限公司专注经营大中华市场的销售活动。

One Energy is focusing on E-Powering the future mobility. Our products include LEVs, E-Motorcycles, intelligent swappable battery and intelligent battery swapping system is the best in the world.
 We have extensive experience in EV, Battery, VCU, and battery swapping  systems, LEV power train system. Our team of experts excels in  research and development, manufacturing, and service delivery, ensuring the  highest quality standards in our products and solutions.
Our battery swappable E-Motorcycle and intelligent battery swapping system is the one and only water-cooling battery swapping system with automatic fire extinguishing system.
Our E-Motorcycles are wildly used by logistics companies like last mile delivery, service fleet, police force and other transportation area. Our main market is South East Asia, Africa and South America where the motorcycle is the main transportation tools.
We now have factories in China, Thailand and operations in China, SEA, Africa and Europe.
We are looking for partners and investors for worldwide expansion.

OneChain is a technology company specializing in blockchain solutions that streamline digital credential management, traceability, and secure data exchange for businesses. The company focuses on leveraging blockchain's transparency and immutability to deliver innovative applications across industries such as education, supply chain, and ESG compliance. By integrating advanced technologies like smart contracts and interoperability, OneChain aims to drive efficiency, trust, and scalability in digital ecosystems, empowering organizations with reliable and future-ready solutions.

OneChain 是一家专门提供区块链解决方案的技术公司，其解决方案能够帮助企业简化数字凭证管理、可追溯性和安全的数据交换。该公司专注于利用区块链的透明度和不可变性，为教育、供应链和 ESG 合规等行业提供创新应用。通过集成智能合约和互操作性等先进技术，OneChain 旨在提高数字生态系统的效率、信任度和可扩展性，为组织提供可靠且面向未来的解决方案。

Your Gateway to Global Impact Investing 
 
OneCup looks to harness the power of security token offerings in real estate to build and grow sustainable green smart cities. We look to provide alternative investment opportunities to investors and work with governments, developers and building owners, to build and renovate real estate while providing investors investment opportunities to help own and fund the change.
 
OneCup will be leveraging Automated Valuation Model to not only compare and forecast changes in value of the real estate, but also help identify factors to decrease carbon footprint and energy consumption to lead positive changes in communities.


您通往全球影响力投资的门户 
 
OneCup 希望利用房地产安全代币发行的力量，建设和发展可持续发展的绿色智能城市。我们希望为投资者提供另类投资机会，并与政府、开发商和建筑业主合作，建设和改造房地产，同时为投资者提供投资机会，帮助他们拥有和资助变革。

OneCup 将利用自动估值模型，不仅对房地产的价值变化进行比较和预测，还将帮助确定减少碳足迹和能源消耗的因素，从而为社区带来积极的变化。

ONEFi provides a platform to web2 users to step into web3. it enables users to trade, stake and manage traditional & crypto assets. Utilizing advanced artificial intelligence, ONEFi analyzes each user's financial situation, objectives, and risk tolerance to craft a customized wealth growth strategy. The platform operates in key global markets including Hong Kong, Japan, Australia and Singapore.

OneKey design and develop open-source hardware and software wallets, with hardware wallets using EAL 6+ high-security level chips. The code has undergone a security audit by SlowMist, and numerous security features protect users' crypto assets, earning the trust of DeFi players, miners, and professional investors.

OneKey 持续设计与研发开源软硬件钱包，硬件钱包采⽤ EAL 6+ ⾼安全级别芯⽚。代码经过 SlowMist安全审计，众多安全功能为用户的加密资产保驾护航，深受 DeFi 玩家、矿⼯、专业投资者信赖。

On-us is a global PaaS company providing B2B2C e-voucher solutions, powered by patented FinTech & Behavioral AI. We help businesses enhance customer loyalty and drive sales success through personalized and seamless incentive engagement. It is our mission to create maximum values for marketers, merchants, and consumers within our ecosystem.
In 2024, On-us won the prestigious ‘Visa Accelerator Program - Loyalty of the Future’ and launched the patented Smart e-Voucher with Visa. The innovation seamlessly integrates e-vouchers with credit card payments, influencing cardholder preferences, driving cross-border spending, boosting merchant traffic and revenue, and enhancing customer engagement with designated exhibitors or partners.


On-us 是一家提供 B2B2C 电子凭证方案的全球性 PaaS 公司，以获得专利的金融科技和行为人工智能为驱动。我们通过个性化和无缝的激励参与措施，帮助企业提高客户忠诚度，推动销售成功。我们的使命是在我们的生态系统中为营销人员、商家和消费者创造最大价值。
2024 年，On-us 赢得了著名的 “Visa Accelerator Program - Loyalty of the Future”，并推出了获得专利的 Visa 智能电子优惠券。这项创新将电子优惠券与信用卡支付无缝整合，影响持卡人的使用偏好，推动了跨境消费，提高商户的客流量和收入，并增强了客户与指定参展商或合作伙伴的互动。

Leveraging digital data and integrating the business scenarios of brands, we create a variety of investment solutions to invest in emerging brands and high-quality store assets across innovative platforms like TikTok, WeChat, Pinduoduo, Tmall, and Xiaohongshu.  We are dedicated to delivering efficient financing solutions to emerging brands, accelerating their business growth, and while pioneering an innovative asset class that enables global investors to participate in China's booming e-commerce market.

A Revolution in the $4.1 Trillion Foodservice Industry: 

ORDRZ is transforming the global foodservice industry by empowering restaurants to regain control over their digital presence and order flow. In a market where third-party aggregators control over 60% of online orders, our AI-powered platform helps restaurants drive direct orders, eliminate high commission fees, and build stronger relationships with their customers. 

With over 1 million orders processed and 450 restaurants already onboarded, ORDRZ is primed for explosive growth in a $200 billion market. 

Join us in leading a revolution that will reshape the way millions of restaurants operate and thrive—delivering significant returns and lasting impact.


ORDRZ 是一家由餐厅经营者为各大餐厅打造的直接下单平台。平台旨在普及第三方在线下单，让餐厅得以直接通过自己的网站提供自提和外送订单服务。

“在线订单问题在北美价值千亿美元。” 
1. 北美在线外送订单达到 3700 亿美元，其中 97% 使用聚合平台提供服务。
2. 餐厅需为在线销售和外送支付高达 30% 的佣金。
3. 消费者自心爱餐厅处购入昂贵的食品。

我们当前在加拿大和巴基斯坦运营业务，平台覆盖超过 450 家餐厅，处理订单量高达数百万。平台提供在线下单网站、应用程序、销售终端、自主下单终端、数字忠诚度计划、集成支付和配送。

I’m Dan Kaye, Founder and CEO of DansFarmaRoot, a Canadian Ginseng Farm to Table nutraceutical and wellness brand, with a  bold vision for international expansion. Our mission is simple yet transformative: to redefine health and wellness with premium, natural products powered by the world-renowned Canadian Ginseng.

Why DansFarmaRoot?
Unmatched Product Excellence & Recognition:

1) Winner of #1 Best Nutraceutical at the 2022 Grocery Innovations Canada for our flagship product, DFENERGY.
Farm-to-table, plant-based, caffeine-free formulations that align with the growing demand for sustainable and health-focused consumer products.

2) Traction That Inspires Confidence:

$720K+ in revenue within 18 months from premium ginseng root sales across Canadian Asian grocery markets alone.

3) Secured a Costco vendor code, a gateway to mass distribution in North America and Asia.

4) Full regulatory approvals for our nutraceutical and skincare products, streamlining international scalability.
Strategic Leadership and Expertise:

5) Recently onboarded Jerry Mancini, Canadian President of Sales at Dole Packaged Foods, as a Senior Advisor to spearhead global expansion.

6) Partnered with Nutralab, an industry leader in R&D and GMP-certified nutraceutical manufacturing.
The Opportunity

The Asian nutraceutical market, valued at $70 billion, is experiencing exponential growth, with Chinese consumers driving demand for premium, natural health products. DansFarmaRoot’s award-winning formulations and high-potency Canadian Ginseng position us as a first-mover in this lucrative market, poised to capitalize on the deep-rooted cultural affinity for ginseng and plant-based wellness solutions.

With your support we aim to:

1) Scale production to meet increasing demand across North America, Asia, and e-commerce channels.

2) Expand distribution through strategic partnerships with Asian retailers, including T&T, HMart, and regional e-commerce leaders.

3) Launch our ginseng-based skincare line, leveraging the burgeoning global wellness and beauty markets.

This is a pivotal moment for DansFarmaRoot, and we are inviting visionary investors like you to help us scale globally and disrupt the nutraceutical and wellness industries.

Let’s discuss how we can collaborate to bring DansFarmaRoot to the forefront of global health innovation.

Warm regards,
Dan Kaye
Founder & CEO, DansFarmaRoot


我是Dan Kaye，DansFarmaRoot的创始人兼首席执行官，DansFarmaRoot是一家加拿大人参农场到餐桌营养和健康品牌，对国际市场扩张有着大胆的想法。 我们的使命很简单，但是革新— 通过世界知名加拿大人参的优质天然产品重新定义健康和保健。

为什么选择DansFarmaRoot？
具有卓越的品质和认可度:

1) 凭借我们的旗舰产品DFENERGY荣获2022年加拿大杂货创新奖最佳营养药物第一名。
从农场到餐桌，植物性，无咖啡因配方，符合对可持续和健康为重点的消费产品不断增长的需求。

2) 我们对产品的口碑充满自信:

仅在加拿大亚洲杂货市场的优质人参根销售收入在18个月内就超过72万加元。

3) 获得了Costco供应商代码，是北美和亚洲大规模分销的门户。

4) 我们的营养品和护肤品获得全面的监管批准，简化了国际扩展。
战略领导力和专业知识:

5) 最近加入Dole Packaged Foods的加拿大销售总裁Jerry Mancini担任了品牌全球扩张的高级顾问。

6) 是研发和GMP认证的营养药物制造行业领导者Nutralab的合作伙伴。

发展机遇

亚洲营养品市场价值为700亿美元，正在经历指数增长。中国消费者推动了大众对优质天然保健品的需求。 DansFarmaRoot屡获殊荣的配方和高功效的加拿大人参使我们成为这个利润丰厚的市场的先行者，有望利用人参和植物性健康解决方案的根深蒂固的文化亲和力。

在您的支持下，我们的目标是:

1) 扩大生产规模，以满足北美、亚洲和电子商务渠道日益增长的需求。

2) 通过与包括T&T、HMart和区域电子商务领导者在内的亚洲零售商建立战略合作伙伴关系，扩大分销网络。

3)利用蓬勃发展的全球健康和美容市场，推出我们的人参护肤品系列。

这是DansFarmaRoot发展的关键时刻，我们邀请像您这样的有远见的投资者帮助我们品牌在全球范围内扩张并颠覆营养和健康行业。

让我们讨论如何进行合作，将DansFarmaRoot带到全球健康创新的前沿。

Dan Kaye
谨上
创始人兼首席执行官，DansFarmaRoot
🌐 www.DANSFARMAROOT.COM

bolster the digital capabilities of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) and traditional retailers in Malaysia, Parcel365, a recognized Sharing Economy Partner of the Malaysia Digital Economy Corporation (MDEC), has teamed up with AliExpress to introduce Alix365 as a new platform tailored to streamline sourcing and procurement processes for local businesses.

AI-Powered Procurement

Penny is a cloud-based Source-To-Pay solution. It is a modular system that is quick to implement and easy to use.
Penny helps you digitize and manage your entire procurement cycle from Purchase Requisitions, Approvals, RFQs, RFP, RFIs, quotations/proposals gathering comparison and analysis, POs, GRN, and even payments.
Along with vendor, contract, spend, and budget management modules. You can track your procurement in full, extract reports, and analysis.
Penny Software is so easy that everyone on your team will love using it.


AI驱动的采购

Penny是一套基于云端的寻源到付款解决方案。它是一个模块化系统，可快速实施且易于使用。
Penny帮助您数字化和管理整个采购周期，从采购申请、审批、RFQ、RFP、RFI、报价/提案收集比较和分析、PO、GRN，甚至还有付款，
并且包括供应商、合同、支出和预算管理模块。您可以通过全面准确的报告和分析来跟踪您的采购。
Penny软件非常简单，以至于团队中的每个人都会喜欢使用它。

Privé Technologies is a leading Software as a Service (SaaS) provider, helping financial institutions to digitize their wealth management offerings using our modular platform.

The breadth of our suite of products – which spans from client acquisition and content marketing, to digital onboarding and CRM, to portfolio construction, portfolio management (PMS), portfolio monitoring and reporting, to account aggregation, and more – is unparalleled in the financial technology industry. 

Our lego block approach allows clients to choose and assemble unique journeys from our wide range of modules and digital solutions to suit their individual needs, empowering them with the tools necessary to achieve any digital goal, be it creating fully digital Advisor-led wealth management journeys to end-to-end robo-advisory solutions. This modularity and flexibility allows us to solve a wide variety of use cases across the wealth management landscape through our scalable, cloud based platform, and helps our clients to expedite their digitisation efforts. It also allows us to service a range of different wealth segments from HNWI to mass retail. Our tools currently live with Private Banks, Retail Banks, Insurers, Asset Managers, Securities & Brokerage providers as well as Multi-family offices and External Asset Managers.

自 2011 年以来，Privé 的创新专利技术为金融机构提供了易于采用的端到端模块化数字解决方案。模块可以独立部署或集成部署，并设计为可组合使用。这些久经考验的解决方案使金融机构能够以更高的效率运营，并能够为客户提供获得更好的体验。

我们承诺为客户提供创新数字工具与贴心服务，以可靠性、高效性和盈利性为引领，携手您及您的客户共同迈入数字时代。我们正在努力与合作伙伴建立应用生态系统，此举将使金融机构能够提供涵盖银行服务、财富管理和保险的一站式解决方案。我们的工具目前适用于私人银行、零售银行、保险公司、资产管理公司、证券商和经纪商以及多家族办公室和外部资产管理公司。

"PropCap Technologies Limited was established in 2020 and proudly joined the Cyberport Incubation Programme, facilitated by InvestHK. As Asia’s first “Green Mortgage Financing Match-Lending Platform”, PropCap is committed to driving Financial Inclusion and Sustainable Finance with innovative mortgage solutions tailored for overseas property buyers.

Our platform goes beyond conventional practices by integrating energy efficiency assessments of properties as a core criterion, in addition to evaluating borrower information. The platform simplifies the mortgage application process, shortens approval times, and enhances funding feasibility of overseas property mortgages.

For professional investors worldwide, PropCap offers unparalleled access to transparent, low-risk, and consistent returns through fixed-income sustainable investment opportunities. By connecting investors and borrowers on an all-encompassing platform, PropCap enables property buyers to achieve their dream of homeownership abroad while promoting sustainability and delivering financial growth."

对于全球专业投资者，PropCap提供高透明度、低风险且稳定回报的可持续投资机会。 作为一个全面的平台，PropCap 连接投资者与借款人，不仅助房产买家圆海外置业梦，还推动可持续发展和金融增长。"

business plan for a Hong Kong-based trading company focusing on purchasing goods from ASEAN countries and trading with mainland China, UAE , India

*Executive Summary*

Our company, SUNSHINE ASEAN PACIFIC aims to capitalize on the growing trade opportunities between ASEAN countries, mainland China, UAE , India. We will source high-quality products from ASEAN countries, repack them in smaller quantities, and distribute them to customers in mainland China and India. Our goal is to achieve $20million in revenue within the first 12 months of operation.

*Business Description*

- *Company Name:* SUNSHINE ASEAN PACIFIC PVT LTD
- *Location:* Hong Kong
- *Business Type:* Trading Company
- *Products:* AGRO FOREST PRODUCT, TRADITIONAL CHINESE MEDICINE RAW MATERIAL  SOURCED from ASEAN countries
- *Target Markets:* Mainland China uae India 

*Market Analysis*

- *Market Size:* The trade volume between ASEAN countries and mainland China is expected to reach $1 trillion by 2025. The Indian market is also growing rapidly, with a projected GDP of $5 trillion by 2025.
UAE also is one of the important market 
- *Competitive Landscape:* The market is competitive, but there is still room for innovation and disruption. Our focus on small packaging and customer convenience will differentiate us from competitors.
- *Market Trends:* Growing demand for ASEAN products in mainland China , UAE ,India, increasing popularity of e-commerce platforms, and rising demand for convenient and affordable products.

*Marketing Strategy*

- *Branding:* Develop a strong brand identity that reflects our values of quality, convenience, and customer satisfaction.
- *Digital Marketing:* Utilize social media platforms, e-commerce websites, and online advertising to reach our target audience.
- *Trade Shows and Exhibitions:* Participate in trade shows and exhibitions in mainland China and India to showcase our products and build relationships with potential customers.
- *Partnerships:* Collaborate with suppliers, logistics providers, and other stakeholders to ensure efficient and cost-effective operations.

*Operations Plan*

- *Sourcing:* Establish relationships with reliable suppliers in ASEAN countries to source high-quality products.
- *Repacking:* Invest in repackaging equipment and facilities to repackage products in smaller quantities.
- *Logistics:* Partner with logistics providers to ensure efficient and cost-effective transportation of goods.
- *Warehousing:* Rent or lease warehouse space in Hong Kong and mainland China to store goods.

*Management Team*

- *CEO:* NIKIL KUMAR GOYAL, experienced trader and business leader
- *Procurement Manager: NIKIL KUMAR GOYAL
- *Marketing Manager- ANKITA AGRAWAL, experienced marketer and brand builder
- *Operations Manager: RUPESH AGRAWAL 
- ⁠, logistics and operations expert000

"一家香港贸易公司的商业计划，专注于从东盟国家购买商品并与中国大陆、阿联酋、印度进行贸易

*执行摘要*

我们公司 SUNSHINE ASEAN PACIFIC 专注于利用东盟国家、中国大陆、阿联酋、印度之间不断增长的贸易机会。我们将从东盟成员国采购高质量的产品，将其重新包装为较小分量，再分销给中国大陆和印度的客户。我们的目标是在开始经营后的头 12 个月内实现 2000 万美元的收入。

*业务描述*

- *公司名称：* SUNSHINE ASEAN PACIFIC PVT LTD
- *地点：* 香港
- *业务类型：* 贸易公司
- *产品：* 采购自东盟国家的农林产品、传统中药原料
- *目标市场：* 中国大陆、阿联酋、印度 

*市场分析*

- *市场规模：* 到 2025 年，东盟国家与中国大陆之间的贸易额预计将达到 1 万亿美元。印度市场也在快速增长，预计到 2025 年 GDP 将达到 5 万亿美元。
阿联酋也是重要的市场之一 
- *竞争格局：* 市场具有竞争力，但仍有创新和颠覆的空间。我们对小包装和客户便利性的关注将使我们从竞争对手中脱颖而出。
- *市场趋势：* 中国大陆、阿联酋、印度对东盟产品的需求不断增长，电子商务平台的普及程度不断提高，消费者对便捷、性价比高的产品需求日益增长。

*营销策略*

- *品牌塑造：* 建立反映我们质量、便利性和客户满意度价值观的强大品牌形象。
- *数字营销：* 利用社交媒体平台、电子商务网站和线上广告来吸引我们的目标受众。
- *贸易展览会：* 参加中国大陆和印度的贸易展览会，展示我们的产品，并与潜在客户建立关系。
- *合作伙伴关系：* 与供应商、物流供应商和其他利益相关者合作，确保高效且具有成本效益的运营。

*运营计划*

- *采购：* 与东盟国家的可靠供应商建立关系，以采购高质量的产品。
- *重新包装：* 投资重新包装设备和设施，将产品重新包装为较小分量。
- *物流：* 与物流供应商合作，确保有效且具有成本效益的货物运输。
- *仓库：* 租赁或租赁香港和中国大陆的仓库空间以储存货物。

*管理团队*

- *首席执行官：* NIKIL KUMAR GOYAL，经验丰富的交易员和商界领袖
- *采购经理：NIKIL KUMAR GOYAL
- *营销经理 - ANKITA AGRAWAL，资深市场营销专家和品牌缔造者
- *运营经理：RUPESH AGRAWAL 
- ⁠物流和运营专家"

TagHive Inc., incorporated in 2017, is a Samsung funded education technology company with headquarters in South Korea and an office in India. "Top Fruits Agritech Limited, founded in 1986 by Dr. Tan Sue Sian and Dr. Tan Sue Yee, is a leader in the AgriTech sector, focusing on innovative solutions for the durian market. The company integrates Al and IoT technologies to enhance agricultural productivity and sustainability.
Based in Hong Kong, Top Fruits is expanding its global presence by establishing an Agritech Durian R&D Lab and farm in the Greater Bay Area. Their technology suite includes weather stations, soil moisture sensors, and drone spraying systems, all designed to optimize farm management.
Committed to quality and innovation, Top Fruits holds various certifications for food safety. With extensive R&D collaborations and a focus on sustainable practices, the company is well-positioned to capitalize on the projected $14.1 billion global durian market by 2028, aiming to revolutionize farming practices through advanced technology."

"我們公司由曾是醫生的譚瑞賢博士和譚瑞怡博士創辦，是農業科技領域的領導者,專注於榴槤市場的創新解決方案。公司结合人工智慧和物聯網技術,提升農業生產力和永續性。
我們正在透過在大灣區建立首個農業科技榴槤研發實驗室和農場，擴展其全球業務。他們的技術產品包括天氣站、土壤濕度感測器和無人機噴灑系統，旨在優化農場管理。
我們致力於品質與創新,擁有多項食品安全認證。透過廣泛的研發合作與永續實踐的關注,公司在全球榴槤市場預計到2028年將達到141億美元的背景下，具備良好的發展潛力，旨在透過先進技術革新農業生產方式。"

"我们公司由曾是医生的谭瑞贤博士和谭瑞怡博士创办，是农业科技领域的领导者,专注于榴莲市场的创新解决方案。公司结合人工智能和物联网技术,提升农业生产力和永续性。
我们正在透过在大湾区建立首个农业科技榴莲研发实验室和农场，扩展其全球业务。他们的技术产品包括天气站、土壤湿度传感器和无人机喷洒系统，旨在优化农场管理。
我们致力于质量与创新,拥有多项食品安全认证。透过广泛的研发合作与永续实践的关注,公司在全球榴莲市场预计到2028年将达到141亿美元的背景下，具备良好的发展潜力，旨在透过先进技术革新农业生产方式。"

column47:
Trinity Photonics was founded by Dr. Simon Chan and Dr. Dick Chung in 2007 with headquartered at Hong Kong Science Park. We have Invented a patented technology known as "Growable Optical Networks," a revolutionary network system that can be installed in any environment with unlimited bandwidth and unlimited scalability for users and coverage area. Since 2008, we have been providing total solutions, including design, installation, integration, and specialized photonics and fiber manufacturing, to build super optical networks based on our patented technology. To date, we have implemented over 70 super optical networks for schools, government and smart cities in Hong Kong, serving stably for more than 40,000 users 7 x 24 concurrently. 

With the great support from Department for Trade and Investment South Australia (now known as Department for State Development SA), we established a branch office in Adelaide Technology Park in 2022 and expand our market to Australia.   Based on the experience on building “Growable Optical Networks” and training professionals for the installation in Hong Kong, together with the leading from colleagues from DSD SA, we have modified our “Growable Optical Network” and also invented another breakthrough technology in Adelaide.  We will collaborate with Department for Education SA with the goal to transform Adelaide as the Best Education City in the world by our modified “Growable Optical Network”.  Our roadmap for the new invention will be a “Made-in-Australia” technology to serve the world


Trinity Photonics 由Simon Chan 博士和. Dick Chung 博士于2007年创立，总部设于香港科学园。我们发明了一项名为 “可增长光纤网络 ”的专利技术，这是一种革命性的网络系统，可安装在任何环境中，带宽无限，为用户和覆盖范围提供无限带宽和无限可扩展性。自 2008 年以来，我们一直在提供整体解决方案，包括设计、安装、集成以及专业光子学和光纤制造，以构建基于我们专利技术的超级光纤网络。迄今为止，我们已为香港的学校、政府和智慧城市建设了超过 70 个超级光纤网络，持续同时为超过 40,000 名用户提供稳定服务。

在南澳大利亚贸易与投资部（现为南澳大利亚州发展部）的大力支持下，我们于 2022 年在阿德莱德科技园成立了分公司，并将市场拓展至澳大利亚。  根据在香港建立 “可增长光纤网络 ”和培训专业安装人员的经验，在南澳大利亚州发展部同事的领导下，我们对 “可生长光纤网络 ”进行了改进，并在阿德莱德发明了另一项突破性技术。 我们将与南澳大利亚教育部合作，通过我们改进的 “可生长光纤网络”，将阿德莱德打造成为全球最佳教育城市。 我们的新发明路线图将是一项 “澳大利亚制造 ”的技术，服务于全世界。

LILA by VCycene is an AI-powered composter that transforms kitchen waste into high-quality, nutrient-rich compost. It integrates seamlessly into any home environment with its sleek, modern design and operates quietly and odorlessly.

VectorBuilder is a global leader in gene delivery technologies. As a trusted partner for thousands of labs and biotech/pharma companies across the globe, VectorBuilder offers a full spectrum of gene delivery solutions covering virtually all research and clinical needs from bench to bedside. Operating as a multinational company with branches in North America, Europe, China, Japan, South Korea, Australia and Israel, VectorBuilder has served customers in over 90 countries and collaborated with thousands of organizations around the world, including universities, research institutions, biotech/pharma companies, and governmental agencies.

1. Custom vectors and viruses
VectorBuilder is the world’s largest provider of custom vectors for both viral and non-viral gene delivery. We currently tailor-build over 80,000 vectors a year for tens of thousands of researchers around the world.

2. CRO services
Besides custom vectors and viruses, VectorBuilder offers a wide range of CRO services covering many more gene delivery applications in basic research and drug discovery

3. CDMO services
VectorBuilder is a full-service CDMO with extensive experience in cGMP vector manufacturing. Operating several state-of-the-art facilities, we have supported many customers along their entire drug-discovery pipelines, going from research-grade vectors for early discovery, to GMP-like vectors for preclinical testing, to full GMP-grade vectors for clinical trials. We have provided IND-enabling vectors to a worldwide client base in the US, Europe, Japan, China and South Korea. Our CDMO services include process development, analytical development, cell banking, fill/finish and regulatory support.

4.IP out-licensing
With strong R&D capabilities, VectorBuilder has built an extensive IP portfolio of gene delivery technologies, some of which can be out-licensed. These include new AAV serotypes, novel viral G proteins, engineered tissue-specific promoters, high-yield recombinant protein producer cell lines, etc.


VectorBuilder 是基因传递技术领域的全球领导者。作为被全球数千家实验室和生物技术/制药公司信赖的合作伙伴，VectorBuilder 提供全方位的基因传递解决方案，几乎涵盖了从实验室到临床的所有研究和临床需求。作为一家跨国公司，VectorBuilder 在北美、欧洲、中国、日本、韩国、澳大利亚和以色列设有分支机构，为 90 多个国家的客户提供服务，并与全球数千家组织合作，包括大学、研究机构、生物技术/制药公司和政府机构。

1. 定制载体和病毒
VectorBuilder 是世界上最大的病毒和非病毒基因传递定制载体提供商。我们目前每年为全球数万名研究人员定制超过 80,000 个载体。

2. 受托研究机构服务（CRO）
除了定制载体和病毒，VectorBuilder 还提供广泛的 CRO 服务，涵盖基础研究和药物发现中的基因传递应用

3.托开发暨制造服务（CDMO）
VectorBuilder 是一家提供全方位服务的CDMO，在 cGMP 载体制造方面拥有丰富的经验。我们运营着几家最先进的设施，为许多客户的整个药物发现流程提供支持，从用于早期发现的研究级载体，到用于临床前测试的 GMP 类载体，再到用于临床试验的全 GMP 级载体。我们为美国、欧洲、日本、中国和韩国的全球客户提供 IND 支持载体。我们的 CDMO 服务包括工艺开发、分析开发、细胞库、灌装/完成和监管支持。

4.IP 对外授权
凭借强大的研发能力，VectorBuilder 建立了广泛的基因传递技术 IP 组合，其中一些可以对外授权。这些包括新的 AAV 血清型、新型病毒 G 蛋白、工程组织特异性启动子、高产重组蛋白生产细胞系等。

column47:
At VEKIN, we leverage deep-tech solutions—integrating AI and blockchain—to empower organizations in accurately measuring, verifying, and enhancing their sustainability performance. Our  technology turns environmental data into actionable intelligence, driving real-world progress toward a cleaner future.

We understand that achieving true environmental impact means not only monitoring carbon credits and footprints but also aligning them with sound financial strategies. Our platform seamlessly integrates real-time sustainability metrics with transparent cost analyses, helping you maximize the value of your green initiatives. By giving you instant visibility into expenditures, returns, and long-term savings opportunities, we empower you to confidently invest in solutions that benefit both the planet and your bottom line. With VEKIN, every sustainability decision becomes a strategic, data-driven step toward a cleaner, more profitable future.


VEKIN利用集成了AI和区块链的深度技术解决方案，使各组织能够准确衡量、验证和提高其可持续发展绩效。我们的技术将环境数据转化为可操作的智能，推动现实世界朝着更清洁的未来迈进。

我们理解，实现真正的环境影响不仅意味着监控碳信用和碳足迹，还意味着使它们与健全的金融策略保持一致。我们的平台将实时可持续发展指标与透明的成本分析无缝集成起来，帮助您最大限度地发挥绿色环保计划的价值。通过让您即时了解支出、回报和长期节能减排机会，我们使您能够自信地投资于既有利于地球又有利于您的利润的解决方案。有了VEKIN，每个可持续发展决策都成为朝着更清洁、更富有回报的未来推出的战略性、数据驱动型举措。

column47:
Verseprop is a commercial real estate tokenization platform, headquartered in London.  It is operational, regulated and revenue producing, having launched in September 2024. It makes real estate debt and equity accessible; faster, more efficiently, and more transparently than traditional Companies.

As an FCA approved Appointed Representative, Verseprop has already completed its first tokenized real estate credit transaction in the UK and is now starting to integrate into several private real estate companies.

A key 'Verseprop Edge' is that it has been built and led by a team of specialists with extensive experience in real estate, finance, and blockchain technology. Boasting track records from CBRE, Savills, Schroders, Columbia Threadneedle and Greengage, the unique combination of expertise positions us to drive innovation and lead the sector's evolution serves as a competitive edge in this emerging market.

Verseprop’s collaborations with globally recognized organizations ensure our platform remains at the forefront of compliance and innovation. Some examples include:
- RICS Technology Partner: Aligning with global real estate standards.
- Strata Global: Principal firm overseeing our Verseprop's regulation as an FCA approved Appointed Representative.
- VARA UAE: Collaboration with a Dubai-based partner regulated by the Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority.

column33: Deep Technology,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology
column47:
Volta Technique is a Canadian cleantech company specializing in next-generation mechanical energy storage solutions. Our proprietary Small Modular Compressed Air Energy Storage (SMCAES) technology offers a clean, efficient, and sustainable alternative to traditional energy storage methods. By utilizing boreholes to store surplus electricity as compressed air, our system provides emissions-free power generation during peak demand periods. Unlike traditional batteries, SMCAES offers chemical-free, recyclable, and fuel-free operation with extended life cycles and enhanced efficiency.

The company targets industrial facilities, data centers, and utilities, providing scalable solutions for energy management and decarbonization. With a strong intellectual property portfolio, including a granted US patent and pending applications in Canada, the EU, Australia, and parts of Asia, Volta Technique is poised to address the growing need for scalable, reliable, and environmentally friendly energy storage solutions.

We invite you to explore and invest in a transformative technology that aims to reshape energy management and support global decarbonization efforts for years to come.

Volta Technique 是一家加拿大洁净科技公司，专注于下一代机械能量存储解决方案。我们自主研发的 小型模块化压缩空气能量存储技术 (SMCAES) 提供了一种清洁、高效、可持续的传统能量存储替代方案。通过利用钻孔将多余电力以压缩空气形式储存，我们的系统在高峰需求期间提供无排放的电力输出。与传统电池不同，SMCAES 不含化学物质，可回收、无燃料运行，拥有更长的使用寿命和更高的效率。

公司主要面向工业设施、数据中心和公用事业，提供可扩展的能源管理和脱碳解决方案。凭借强大的知识产权组合，包括已获批的美国专利以及在加拿大、欧盟、澳大利亚和部分亚洲地区的专利申请，Volta Technique 致力于满足对可扩展、可靠且环保的能源存储解决方案日益增长的需求。

我们诚邀您探索并投资这一变革性技术，共同推动能源管理的重塑，为全球脱碳努力贡献力量，持续造福未来。
